name: Sidewinder (itch)
description: Take control of a snake-like player and swerve left and right using the arrow keys to avoid the traps. Reach checkpoints and unlock new and more difficult levels, the game will save your progress and high-scores. There is also a test level which is called "Teams" in which there are two snakes on the screen (one with LEFT and RIGHT the other with A and D). Disable the sounds or music using the small menu in the top right. Can you reach the end of the maze and the battlefield?
